title: 154 Why Anger, Guilt, and Fear Cultivate Success (and the Art of Emotional Agility) with Todd Kashdan
description:
"When we share our pain, we grow closer than at any other point in our lives." - Todd Kashdan
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/154.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
